page.title: 09CHESTERTON'S MAIN GARAGE
page.content: The main Vauxhall dealer for the area, Cirencester Garage, occupies a crowded 1.75 acre site 1.3km SE of the town centre.The firm's 50 staff work 8 hrs a day servicing,spraying and repairing new and used cars.There is also a car and truck hire department.Horse boxes and other special vehicles can also be hired and all these are serviced and repaired on site.There is also a car wash,a MOT testing section and a motor spares department.Average new car sales are 15 a month prices ranging from Â£4,500-Â£13,500.There is also a place for wrecked cars, the results of traffic accidents.Two were brought in while we were there.These will stay until the insurance claim has been settled.The manager foresees a time when due to new materials and techniques car servicing will be a thing of the past.
